ygData.subject: Re: Bards always complaining
ygData.msgSnippet: Bards and friends, IMHO i love that surfing look as we speed across the lands. It does in fact set us apart from any other class, along with the fact that no
ygData.messageBody:
Bards and friends,
IMHO i love that "surfing" look as we speed across the lands. It does in
fact set us apart from any other class, along with the fact that no other
can sing. =P
If Verant changes our animation, I'll absolutely die! hehe Only becuase
I'm a gnarly dude, I don't know about anyone else LOL!
And yes, I'm still awaiting the strumming the drum effect to be debugged,
although we look like we're playing air guitar. So it's all good i suppose.

Pava, Bard of 16 verses (almost to dual wield!! yay!!)
Silent Dragons
Cazic Thule


Kitasi wrote:
> > But I don't want to stop surfing, does anyone? I think that is one of
>our
> > coolest animations that we surf across the ground as we blaze across
>Norrath
> > in a cacophony of light bubbles. It will be a sad day indeed when even
>our
> > appearance is nerfed. Heaven above forbid bards should look cooler at
>any
> > time than someone else. That might be unbalancing. Never mind that we
>have
> > a stick for a drum, and we strum it!
> >
> > Kitasi, tired of being nerfed on E'ci
